info.author: Damjan Krstevski
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
| To use this module first you will need to register on http://bit.ly/
| After your registration you need to get the API KEY
| http://bit.ly/a/your_api_key/
|
| After this, you can use this module.
|
| Also the BitLy will allow you to add your FaceBook and Twitter account.
| This options you can find in the BitLy's accound settings.
|
| An examples you can see in the examples.py file of the BitLyClient folder.
info.keywords: bit.ly, facebook, twitter, library, python, api
info.name: BitLyClient-Library
info.summary: Shortening the long link(s) via web service from the Bit.Ly and sharing on your FaceBook or Twitter account.
info.html_description:
To use this module first you will need to register on http://bit.ly/
After your registration you need to get the API KEY
http://bit.ly/a/your_api_key/

After this, you can use this module.

Also the BitLy will allow you to add your FaceBook and Twitter account.
This options you can find in the BitLy’s accound settings.

An examples you can see in the examples.py file of the BitLyClient folder.

1.0.0.comment_text: This module will help you to cut the long link(s) via web service from the Bit.Ly

urls.comment_text: This module will help you to cut the long link(s) via web service from the Bit.Ly
